title: Celtic Mythology
description: Venture into the mystical world of Celtic gods, heroes, and legends

questions.question: In Irish mythology, what was the name of the legendary warriors led by Fionn mac Cumhaill?
Who was the great hero of the Ulster Cycle, known for his battle frenzy?
What was the Tuatha De Danann in Irish mythology?
options: A supernatural race of god-like beings

questions.question: In Celtic tradition, what was Samhain?
options: A harvest celebration marking the end of summer

questions.question: The Dagda was a chief god in Irish mythology known for possessing which magical object?
What was the 'Otherworld' (Tir na nOg) in Celtic belief?
options: A supernatural realm of eternal youth

questions.question: Which Celtic goddess was associated with war, fate, and death, often appearing as a crow?
In Welsh mythology, what is the 'Mabinogion'?
Brigid was a Celtic goddess associated with what?
What role did druids play in Celtic society?
options: They were priests, scholars, and judges

questions.question: The 'Salmon of Knowledge' in Irish mythology granted wisdom to whom?
Lugh was a Celtic god known for his mastery of what?
In the Welsh tale, who was Rhiannon?
options: A goddess associated with horses and birds

questions.question: What were the Fomorians in Irish mythology?
options: A race of hostile supernatural beings

questions.question: The Stone of Destiny (Lia Fail) in Irish legend was said to do what?
options: Cry out when the rightful king touched it
